body: Thought this was gonna be yuri at first but this was a welcome surprise
This one it's a masterpiece. Safe sex, consensual, and vanilla. It's perfect
Going out of their way to show that even the damn mere Doujinshi have a better Storyline than Mainstream Manga. Kudo.
This doujin spends the majority of it's time developing the relationship between characters rather than the actual sex, not to mention that the pacing is a bit slow. All in all, Mars is unimpressed
Idk but Melt into one part had me crying
